definition: background/bottom/base/end (of the month, year etc)/remnants/(math.) radix/base

sentences.english: And here's what it looks like after a whole lot of primer .
sentences.chinese: 和这里的是什么，它看起来像后，整个很多底漆。

sentences.english: A thick coating stain sealer, and make it dry overnight.
sentences.chinese: 涂装一层厚的污渍封闭底漆，并使它隔夜晾干。

sentences.english: Primed for off-road impact or urban streets.
sentences.chinese: 底漆为越野的影响或市区街道。

sentences.english: It was also painted with inorganic zinc-rich primer.
sentences.chinese: 它还被漆上无机富锌底漆。

sentences.english: Good adhesion on zinc-rich primers or galvanized coatings.
sentences.chinese: 对富锌底漆或喷锌层表面具有优良的附着力。

sentences.english: All uninstalled carbon steel surfaces shall be primed and painted.
sentences.chinese: 所有未安装的碳钢表面均应涂以底漆及油漆。？

sentences.english: It is proved that the dust of commonly used putty can affect the adhesion between the primer and the inter coat significantly;
sentences.chinese: 普通原子灰灰尘严重影响底漆与中涂之间的附着力。

sentences.english: Locate industry-specific encoder case studies and primers quickly and easily.
sentences.chinese: 找到特定行业的编码器的个案研究和底漆快捷方便。

sentences.english: Quick drying primer with excellent corrosion inhibiting properties.
sentences.chinese: 快干型底漆，具有优异的防锈性能。

sentences.english: This is the first coat of primer using no red putty at all.
sentences.chinese: 这是第一层的底漆使用也没有红腻子在所有。

sentences.english: Star Maling Epoxy Primer can be used as a corrosion resistant primer on abrasive blasted steel.
sentences.chinese: 可作为防锈底漆，适用于喷砂处理的钢材表面。

sentences.english: It's a two component, polyamide cured epoxy zinc rich primer.
sentences.chinese: 双组份富锌环氧聚酰胺固化的底漆。
双组分，聚酰胺固化环氧富锌底漆。

sentences.english: High quality thinner specially designed for"LZ" basecoat and topcoat.
sentences.chinese: 特性专为利众底漆及面漆产品而设计之高品质稀释剂。

sentences.english: This invention relates to a water-based epoxy zinc-rich priming paint.
sentences.chinese: 本发明涉及一种水性环氧富锌底漆。

sentences.english: The undercoat is dense, from one to two inches in depth, oily and woolly.
sentences.chinese: 该底漆是稠密的，从一两英寸深，含油和茫然。

definition: to point a brick wall/to grout a tiled surface
to apply paint, veneer etc/to plaster over/decorative coating/finish/veneer
